document_data.name: Davra Jassur
document_data.mainbody: '''Davra Jassur''' was an [[assassin]] and a member of the [[Zhentarim]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Davra's job for the Zhentarim was to recruit promising valuable assets, but she also silenced those who were possible weaknesses to the organization.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Davra was the Zhentarim delegate to King [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] of [[Gauntlgrym]]. She was sent to discuss the madness spreading in the [[Underdark]], offering access to Zhentarim outposts in [[Mantol-Derith]] but for a price.
document_data.Personality: Davra was a pragmatic individual, who valued order and discipline as well as drive and ambition above all. She lived to embody those traits.
